predicate.note: Frames file for 'reignite' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: As a result , he reignited the inflation that Mrs. Thatcher , through a long and costly effort , had subdued [*T*-1] .
example.arg: the inflation that Mrs. Thatcher , through a long and costly effort , had subdued [*T*-1]
